kyc.response:
‚úÖ **KYC (Know Your Customer)** verifies your identity and is mandatory for investing in India.

You can complete e-KYC instantly using Aadhaar OTP or upload documents manually. The process is secure and takes just 2-3 minutes!

[Read More about KYC](https://www.investonline.in/faq#kyc)

ekyc_howto.response:
üì± **How to complete e-KYC:**

1. Visit InvestOnline homepage
2. Click 'Login/Signup' button
3. Enter your PAN number
4. Enter Aadhaar number
5. Verify with Aadhaar OTP
6. Upload selfie for photo verification
7. Submit! ‚úÖ

Your KYC will be verified instantly.

[Read More & Start e-KYC](https://www.investonline.in)

kyc_documents.response:
üìÑ **Documents Required for KYC:**

**For e-KYC (Instant):**
‚Ä¢ PAN Card number
‚Ä¢ Aadhaar number
‚Ä¢ Mobile number (linked to Aadhaar)
‚Ä¢ Recent selfie/photo

**For Manual KYC:**
‚Ä¢ PAN Card copy
‚Ä¢ Address proof (Aadhaar/Passport/Driving License)
‚Ä¢ Bank statement/cancelled cheque
‚Ä¢ Passport-size photo

[Read More about KYC Documents](https://www.investonline.in/faq#kyc)

kyc_time.response:
‚è±Ô∏è **KYC Processing Time:**

‚Ä¢ **e-KYC (Aadhaar):** Instant (2-3 minutes) ‚ö°
‚Ä¢ **Manual KYC:** 24-48 hours

Most users complete registration in 6-8 minutes using Aadhaar e-KYC!

[Start Registration Now](https://www.investonline.in)

registration.response:
üéâ **Start Your Investment Journey!**

**Registration Steps:**
1. Visit InvestOnline homepage
2. Click 'Login/Signup' button
3. Fill in your details
4. Complete e-KYC verification
5. Add bank account
6. Start investing! üöÄ

**What you'll need:**
‚Ä¢ PAN number
‚Ä¢ Aadhaar (for instant e-KYC)
‚Ä¢ Bank account details
‚Ä¢ Cancelled cheque/bank statement

[Read More & Start Registration](https://www.investonline.in)

sip.response:
üí∞ **SIP (Systematic Investment Plan)**

Invest a fixed amount every month automatically and build wealth over time!

**Benefits:**
‚Ä¢ Disciplined investing habit
‚Ä¢ Rupee cost averaging
‚Ä¢ Power of compounding
‚Ä¢ Start with as low as ‚Çπ500/month
‚Ä¢ Flexibility to pause/modify anytime

[Read More about SIP](https://www.investonline.in/mutual-funds/lightning-sip)
[Start SIP Now](https://www.investonline.in/mutual-funds)

start_sip.response:
üöÄ **How to Start a SIP:**

1. Login to your InvestOnline dashboard
2. Browse and select a mutual fund
3. Click 'Start SIP'
4. Choose:
   ‚Ä¢ SIP amount (minimum ‚Çπ500)
   ‚Ä¢ SIP date (1-28 of month)
   ‚Ä¢ Duration (minimum 6 months)
5. Set up auto-debit mandate
6. Done! Your SIP is active üéâ

[Read More & Browse Funds](https://www.investonline.in/mutual-funds)
[View Top Performing Funds](https://www.investonline.in/mutual-funds/top-performing-funds)

sip_benefits.response:
‚ú® **Benefits of SIP:**

1. **Disciplined Investing** - Auto-debit monthly
2. **Rupee Cost Averaging** - Buy more units when prices are low
3. **Power of Compounding** - Grow wealth long-term
4. **Flexible** - Start/stop/modify anytime
5. **Low Minimum** - Start with just ‚Çπ500/month
6. **No Market Timing Needed** - Invest systematically

[Read More about SIP Benefits](https://www.investonline.in/mutual-funds/lightning-sip)
[Calculate Your SIP Returns](https://www.investonline.in/financial-calculators/sip-calculator)

redeem.response:
üí∏ **Redeem Mutual Fund:**

**Steps to redeem:**
1. Login to your dashboard
2. Go to 'My Portfolio'
3. Select the fund to redeem
4. Click 'Redeem'
5. Enter amount or units
6. Confirm redemption

‚è±Ô∏è Money will be credited to your bank in **2-4 business days**.

‚ö†Ô∏è Note: Exit load may apply if redeemed before minimum holding period.

[Login to Dashboard](https://www.investonline.in)

switch.response:
üîÑ **Switch Between Funds:**

Move your money between funds of the same AMC (Asset Management Company):

**Steps:**
1. Login to dashboard
2. Select source fund
3. Choose target fund (must be same AMC)
4. Enter amount to switch
5. Confirm switch

‚ö° **Benefit:** No exit load on switches within same AMC!

[Login to Switch Funds](https://www.investonline.in)

onboarding.register: To start registration, you'll need PAN, Aadhaar (for e-KYC) or alternate address proof, bank details and a cancelled cheque.
onboarding.kyc: KYC verifies your identity and is required to invest. You can complete e-KYC instantly using Aadhaar OTP.
onboarding.time: Most users complete registration in 6-8 minutes using Aadhaar e-KYC.

documents.pan: PAN is mandatory to invest. You only need the PAN number - not the physical card.
documents.aadhaar: Aadhaar enables instant e-KYC through OTP.
documents.list: Documents required: PAN, Aadhaar/ID proof, address proof, bank details and a photo for manual KYC.

quick_intents.forgot password: Use the 'Forgot Password' option on the login page.

global.fallback_message: I can help with mutual funds, SIPs, calculators, redemptions, KYC, registration, and platform questions. For anything else, reach out to our support team.
